Angular, WebAPI, SQL Server

Employee Management Portal
import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent { title = 'angular'; role: string | undefined; constructor(public _sharedService: SharedService) {} }
